name: raindrop-search-for-windows
title: Raindrop Search for Windows
description: Search and browse your Raindrop.io bookmarks directly from Raycast
author: Vorm--

commands.name: search-bookmarks
commands.title: Search Bookmarks
commands.description: Search and browse your Raindrop.io bookmarks

preferences.name: testToken
preferences.title: Test Token
preferences.description: Your Raindrop.io test token from app.raindrop.io/settings/integrations

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
